languages.text: "А теперь взгляни мне в глаза, отче, и скажи, что ты готов был бы принять смерть здесь и сейчас без малейшего сожаления и страха".
"Now look me in the eye, Reverend, and tell me you are ready to meet your death right here and now, without a shadow of fear or regret."
languages.original_text: "А теперь взгляни мне в глаза, отче, и скажи, что ты готов был бы принять смерть здесь и сейчас без малейшего сожаления и страха".

traits.locale_text: "Now look me in the eye, Father, and tell me you are ready to meet your death right here and now, without a shadow of fear or regret."
"Now look me in the eye, Father, and tell me you are ready to meet your death right here and now, without a shadow of fear or regret."
"Now look me in the eye, Father, and tell me you are ready to meet your death right here and now, without a shadow of fear or regret."
"Now look me in the eye, Father, and tell me you are ready to meet your death right here and now, without a shadow of fear or regret."
"Now look me in the eye, Reverend, and tell me you are ready to meet your death right here and now, without a shadow of fear or regret."
"Now look me in the eye, Reverend, and tell me you are ready to meet your death right here and now, without a shadow of fear or regret."

languages.text: “既然如此，牧师，那就直视着我的眼睛，告诉我你已经做好了准备。说你愿意在此时此刻迎接死亡，心中没有任何恐惧与后悔。”
languages.original_text: "Now look me in the eye, Reverend, and tell me you are ready to meet your death right here and now, without a shadow of fear or regret."

traits.locale_text: “既然如此，神父，那就直视着我的眼睛，告诉我你已经做好了准备。说你愿意在此时此刻迎接死亡，心中没有任何恐惧与后悔。”

languages.text: 「司祭よ、{mf|俺|私}の目を見ろ。恐れも後悔もなく、今ここで死に向き合う準備はできていると言うんだ」
languages.original_text: "Now look me in the eye, Reverend, and tell me you are ready to meet your death right here and now, without a shadow of fear or regret."

traits.locale_text: 「司祭よ、{mf|俺|私}の目を見ろ。恐れも後悔もなく、今ここで死に向き合う準備はできていると言うんだ」

languages.text: «Míreme a los ojos, reverendo, y dígame que está listo para enfrentarse a la muerte aquí y ahora, sin un ápice de miedo ni arrepentimiento».
languages.original_text: "Now look me in the eye, Reverend, and tell me you are ready to meet your death right here and now, without a shadow of fear or regret."

traits.locale_text: «Míreme a los ojos, padre, y dígame que está listo para enfrentarse a la muerte aquí y ahora, sin un ápice de miedo ni arrepentimiento».

languages.text: "Nun seht mir in die Augen, Reverend, und sagt mir, dass Ihr bereit seid, hier und jetzt den Tod zu begrüßen. Ohne den kleinsten Hauch von Angst oder Reue."
languages.original_text: "Now look me in the eye, Reverend, and tell me you are ready to meet your death right here and now, without a shadow of fear or regret."

traits.locale_text: "Nun seht mir in die Augen, Vater, und sagt mir, dass Ihr bereit seid, hier und jetzt den Tod zu begrüßen. Ohne den kleinsten Hauch von Angst oder Reue."

languages.text: « Regardez-moi dans les yeux, révérend, et dites-moi que vous êtes prêt à mourir ici et maintenant, sans éprouver ne serait-ce qu'une once de peur ou de regret. »
languages.original_text: "Now look me in the eye, Reverend, and tell me you are ready to meet your death right here and now, without a shadow of fear or regret."

traits.locale_text: « Regardez-moi dans les yeux, mon père, et dites-moi que vous êtes prêt à mourir ici et maintenant, sans éprouver ne serait-ce qu'une once de peur ou de regret. »

languages.text: "Gözlerimin içine bak Muhterem. Şu an, burada, hiçbir korku veya pişmanlık duymadan ölmeye hazır olduğunu söyle."
languages.original_text: "Now look me in the eye, Reverend, and tell me you are ready to meet your death right here and now, without a shadow of fear or regret."

traits.locale_text: "Gözlerimin içine bak Muhterem ve bana, şu an, burada, hiçbir korku veya pişmanlık duymadan, ölmeye hazır olduğunu söyle."
